tgt_original: 尊者舍利子告苾芻眾言。

src_original: ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati samādhisampannaś ca prajñāsaṃpannaś ca.  so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
tgt_original: 戒定惠具足者能數數入滅受想定。

src_original: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipady evājñām ārāgayati.  nāpi maraṇakālasamaye.
tgt_original: 彼於現法及將死時。 若不能辨如來聖旨。

src_original: bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate.
tgt_original: 命終起段食天生在意成天中。

src_original: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ [Tib.151b] samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
tgt_original: 於彼復能數數入出滅想受定。

src_original: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān udāyī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhut saṃnipatitaḥ.  athāyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.
tgt_original: 具壽鄔陀夷在彼會坐語尊者舍利子言。
